result.reason: The feature is partially implemented in NameColumn.cs but fails to update ancestor counts when nested items change; requires recursive refresh logic.
result.approach: Update HandleCollectionChanged in ConnectionTree.cs to recursively refresh all ancestors of the modified container to update their connection counts.
